Adam Wildavsky wrote:
> At 5:52 PM -0400 4/22/05, Chris Downey wrote:
>  >The more I thought about this, the more I'm wondering if there is a
>  >known collection of JUnit test patterns.  Any thoughts on this?
> 
> This page is not JUnit specific, but it looks like a good start:
> 
>      http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?TestingPatterns
> 
> There are a number of books that contain testing patterns. Ross
> Rainsberger's "JUnit Recipes" was just recommended.

"Ross Rainsberger"?! Wow. Where the hell did you get /that/ first name? 
:) (I'm sure there's a neat story behind that.)

It's J. B. Rainsberger, thanks.
